responsibilities: Design and implement prototypes multi-media (audio, image, and video) acceleration framework for AI SoC chips
Design and implement prototypes camera system and ISP firmware for AI SoC chips
Design and implement prototypes middleware for AI SoC chips
Contribute to define and design of integrated software-hardware (chipset) solutions for various applications such as robotics, HPC, and automotive
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on designing and implementing prototypes for AI SoC chips, specifically in the areas of multi-media acceleration, camera systems, middleware, and integrated software-hardware solutions. These tasks are related to hardware and firmware development rather than the fine-tuning and customization of language models, which is more aligned with software and AI model development. Therefore, this Activity is not directly relevant to the Job Responsibilities.
